thread.title: Apple launches Apple Music in China for $1.5/month, also available on Android - newsR
thread.title_full: Apple launches Apple Music in China for $1.5/month, also available on Android - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Apple launches Apple Music in China for $1.5/month, also available on Android - newsR
text: Apple announced Wednesday that it has rolled out Apple Music, iTunes Movies, and iBooks in China. Apple’s music-streaming and radio service will be available on Android and free with a three-month trial membership, after which it’s 10 RMB per month ($1.5). The company said it will include a strong line up of Chinese artists as well as international. […] »
